mapper.select: select i.item_id as hotSaleId, i.short_name as saleName, i.sales_volume as salesVolume, d.retail as price, d.images as imgUrl , i.item_type as itemType from wx_item i left join wx_item_detail d on i.item_id = d.item_id where i.item_type = #{itemType} LIMIT #{minRecordNum},#{pageSize}
